code: import createDataContext from'../createDataContext';var TYPES={ADD_NOTIFICATION:'notifications/addNotification',CLEAR_NOTIFICATION:'notifications/clearNotification'};var initialState={message:undefined,visible:false};var notificationsReducer=function notificationsReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case TYPES.ADD_NOTIFICATION:return{visible:true,message:action.payload};case TYPES.CLEAR_NOTIFICATION:return{visible:false,message:''};default:return state;}};var setNotification=function setNotification(dispatch){return function(message){dispatch({type:TYPES.ADD_NOTIFICATION,payload:message});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:TYPES.CLEAR_NOTIFICATION});},1000);};};var clearNotifications=function clearNotifications(dispatch){return function(){dispatch({type:TYPES.CLEAR_NOTIFICATION});};};var _createDataContext=createDataContext(notificationsReducer,{setNotification:setNotification,clearNotifications:clearNotifications},initialState),Provider=_createDataContext.Provider,Context=_createDataContext.Context;export{Provider,Context};
